p.a: Notice of Public Meeting to Discuss Budget and Proposed Tax Rate

div.p: Welcome to the Jim Ned CISD! We hope you find the resources within this website to be informative, useful, and to meet our goal of communicating thoroughly with our entire JN community! While we are very proud of all of our hard work and past successes at Jim Ned, we are committed to continuing our work to fulfill our vision of being a superior educational institution in all areas! We look forward to our continued partnerships with our JN families & other vital stakeholders to ensure our students are not only successful while in school in JNCISD, but also after they graduate from Jim Ned High School! Great days are ahead!

span.strong: Please let us know if we can help make your experience in JNCISD even better for you and your family!

img.a: Core Values, Vision, Goals, and Objectives (2016)

div.p: Integrity, Performance, Stability, Forward-thinking, Transparency, Partnership

Jim Ned CISD endeavors to be a superior educational institution marked by an unwavering commitment to our core values and their capacity to forge exceptional students, vibrant educators, innovative stewardship of finances and facilities, and worthwhile community and commercial partnerships.
Jim Ned CISD students will engage in rigorous and relevant learning, developing the academic fortitude to successfully complete a post-secondary program or secure gainful employment.
Jim Ned CISD graduates will exemplify the attributes defined within the Jim Ned CISD graduate profile.
Jim Ned CISD will attract, retain, and cultivate an enthusiastic and highly-qualified body of educators compelled by an ardent devotion to their craft and students.
Jim Ned CISD will actively and thoughtfully facilitate safe, organized, and drug-free instructional and extracurricular environments.
Jim Ned CISD will exercise innovation, tempered with prudence, in the stewardship of finances and facilities.
Jim Ned CISD will communicate and nurture a trust with its community that is matured over time by the district's demonstrated competence, reliability, honesty, and openness.
Jim Ned CISD will vet, pursue, and sustain mutually-beneficial community and commercial partnerships.

div.p:
Parent Portal has a new link and look, however your login will remain the same.
Portal links are also located under the Student/Parent drop down menu on the campus pages.
Tips
VERIFY EMAIL
Parent email for Parent Portal must match the email used for registration at your child's campus. Please contact the campus secretary if you are having trouble.
RECOMMENDED BROWSERS
(please use latest versions)

hr.strong: CHANGE PARENT PORTAL ON YOUR PHONE
hr.br: Parents who have a link saved to their mobile device will need to delete the old link and create a new one.

a.title: ezTask: Exceptional websites that are affordable and easy to update!
